title: nf-core/exogap pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

name.errorMessage: Sample genome must be provided (can contain spaces).

taxid.errorMessage: TaxID must be provided, contain only numbers.'

fasta.errorMessage: Fasta file for reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', '.fna' or '.fasta'.

main_protein_set.errorMessage: Main protein set file for reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', '.fna' or '.fasta'.

training_protein_set.errorMessage: Training protein set file for reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', '.fna' or '.fasta'.

transcript_set.errorMessage: Transcriptome set file for reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', '.fna' or '.fasta'.
